document_data.name: Rotburg Slum
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rotburg Slum''' was a poverty-stricken neighborhood located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The Slum was not part of Almorel proper, sitting just outside of the city's protective walls to the west. A small unnamed tributary of the Lake of Mists further isolated the Rotburg Slum from the [[Golden Bridle]] [[caravanserai]] and other structures found outside Almorel's western walls.
